name: Mole Hunt
summary: Archer attempts to cover up discrepancies in his ISIS expense account; Cyril and Lana's Friday night dinner is interrupted by work.

name: Training Day
summary: Malory promotes Cyril to field agent and Archer trains his new competition as only he can; Malory frets over her own past and her son's future.

name: Diversity Hire
summary: A new field officer makes a splash at ISIS, however Archer and Lana suspect there may be something all too perfect about their new hire.

name: Killing Utne
summary: Malory hosts a dinner party in an effort to get a new weapons contract for ISIS; a group of rival assassins targets Mr. Utne.

name: Honeypot
summary: Malory's career is threatened when a sensitive video falls into the hands of a rogue Cuban agent.

name: Skorpio
summary: Archer must rescue Lana from the clutches of Skorpio; Cyril not only fears for his girlfriend's life but she may be succumbing to Archer's heroics.

name: Skytanic
summary: Archer and the ISIS crew battle the clock and each other, when a bomb threatens the maiden voyage of the luxury airship Excelsior.

name: The Rock
summary: ISIS loses yet another contract to ODIN, so Malory assigns Archer and Lana to steal a priceless diamond from ODIN's biggest client in order to embarrass the rival spy agency.

name: Job Offer
summary: Archer takes a higher paying job at a rival agency ODIN; Malory will stop at nothing to get Archer back at ISIS.

name: Dial M for Mother
summary: Questions about the true identity of Archer's father lead him into a perilous trap; Archer and Malory have an explosive confrontation.

name: Swiss Miss
summary: Archer has to protect a teenage girl from kidnappers, she makes passes at him and no one will believe that he was not initiating the advances.

name: A Going Concern
summary: Malory hatches a Ponzi scheme of her own and the ISIS employees must try to stop her from selling ISIS to ODIN.

name: Blood Test
summary: Archer is accused of being the father of a woman's baby and ODIN agents take his blood for a paternity test.

name: Pipeline Fever
summary: Malory tries making ISIS green; Archer and Lana go to the Louisiana bayous to stop an eco-terrorist.

name: The Double Deuce
summary: When members of Woodhouse's famed WWI Royal Flying Corps squadron start dying mysteriously, Archer tries to track down the killer.

name: Tragical History
summary: Cyril agrees to help George Spelvin inject a virus into the ISIS mainframe so Cyril can defeat the virus and be seen as a hero.

name: Movie Star
summary: Hollywood actress Rona Thorne spends a week shadowing the agents at ISIS as research for a upcoming role in a spy film.

name: Stage Two
summary: After Malory's brief scare with breast cancer, Archer decides to be tested for the disease with tragic results.

name: Placebo Effect
summary: Archer discovers the chemotherapy drugs he's been taking are counterfeit and sets out to destroy the criminals behind the scheme.

name: El Secuestro
summary: ISIS goes into full lockdown after Pam is abducted by kidnappers; Cheryl turns out to be not quite what she appears; Cyril looses his temper and takes matters into his own hands.

name: Jeu Monegasque
summary: A mysterious strange summons Malory and her intrepid ISIS agents to Monaco during Gran Prix week to make an expensive trade.

name: White Nights
summary: Archer's search for his father's identity leads him into hot water in Russia; Agent Barry Dillon is sent to rescue Archer.

name: Double Trouble
summary: Suspicion and jealousy arise at ISIS as Krieger nears completion of a top secret project; Archer brings Katya Kazanova home to meet Malory.

name: Heart of Archness: Part I
summary: Archer is finally tracked down in the South Pacific by handsome adventurer Rip Riley in order to return him to ISIS.

name: Heart of Archness: Part II
summary: Archer deals with the trials and tribulations of being Pirate King; ISIS remains semi-committed to Archer's rescue.

name: Heart of Archness: Part III
summary: Archer and his fellow prisoners attempt to escape; Malory plays hardball while negotiating Archer's ransom.

name: The Man from Jupiter
summary: Archer is shocked to learn that his mother is dating Archer's idol/hero/man-crush, Burt Reynolds.

name: El Contador
summary: Cyril is promoted to field agent, while Malory institutes a strict drug-testing policy. Neither of which sit well with the staff of ISIS.

name: The Limited
summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police enlist the help of ISIS to transport a captured Canadian terrorist. On a train.

name: Drift Problem
summary: Archer's surprise birthday present - a high-tech, souped-up spy car - leads to all sorts of other surprises. None of which are good.

name: Lo Scandalo
summary: Malory turns to Archer and Lana for help when she finds herself in a compromising situation with the Italian prime minister.

name: Bloody Ferlin
summary: Archer must help Gillette save his younger brother from a crooked sheriff in the backwoods of West Virginia.

name: Crossing Over
summary: Archer's sex life compromises his effectiveness as an agent. But more seriously than the countless other times.

name: Skin Game
summary: Archer is faced with a dilemma when his murdered fiancée, Katya, miraculously reappears. In Krieger's lab.

name: Space Race: Part I
summary: Archer and his colleagues at ISIS voyage to the final frontier in an effort to prevent a catastrophe on the International Space Station.

name: Space Race: Part II
summary: Archer and his colleagues at ISIS wish they had never voyaged to the final frontier in an effort to prevent a catastrophe on the International Space Station.

name: Fugue and Riffs
summary: Archer has amnesia and decides the only cure is a spa weekend.

name: The Wind Cries Mary
summary: Archer and his former best friend are holed up in the Vermont wilderness, fighting hard to come out on top.

name: Legs
summary: Archer's fear of cyborgs hits home when Krieger offers to make robotic legs for Gillette.

name: Midnight Ron
summary: The beginning of beautiful hatred between Archer and his new stepfather plays out as the two are chased by gangsters.

name: Vicious Coupling
summary: Archer's former fiancé wants him to save her cyborg boyfriend who is trapped in outer space. Archer wants...other things.

name: Once Bitten
summary: A snake bites Archer in a special place.Tensions come to a head between Lana and Malory.

name: Live and Let Dine
summary: Archer, Lana, and Cyril go undercover in celebrity chef Lance Casteau's hellish kitchen.

name: Coyote Lovely
summary: Archer heads to the Mexican border to capture a notorious coyote, which is Spanish for coyote.

name: The Honeymooners
summary: Archer and Lana pose as newlyweds to stop a sale of enriched uranium. SPOILER ALERT: Lana goes nuclear before the bomb does.

name: Un Chien Tangerine
summary: Archer and Lana extract an agent from Morocco only to find out his bark is worse than his bite.

name: The Papal Chase
summary: Archer must rescue the Pope from an assassination plot using Woodhouse as a decoy. Operation Bad Habit is a go.

name: Sea Tunt: Part I
summary: Cheryl's brother Cecil Tunt and his girlfriend Tiffy drive her crazier than usual as they travel into the Bermuda Triangle. Where mysteries abound!.

name: Sea Tunt: Part II
summary: Archer and the ISIS crew go to an underwater SEA LABoratory to stop the deranged Captain Murphy.

name: White Elephant
summary: Someone dies. Someone who has been with the ISIS crew from the beginning. And then things get crazy.

name: A Kiss While Dying
summary: Archer, Pam and Lana travel to Miami to visit some old friends. It's a fondue party!

name: A Debt of Honor
summary: Pam makes a deal that puts everyone in danger. Archer dons his slightly darker black suit to save the day.

name: House Call
summary: Archer has to stage an intervention for Pam that gets derailed by an unwanted guest.

name: Southbound and Down
summary: Malory buys a bus and takes everyone on a road trip. Put that hammer down and give it hell. .

name: Baby Shower
summary: Archer decides to give Lana the perfect baby shower gift by forcing Kenny Loggins to sing a duet with Cherlene. Something something Danja Zown!

name: Smugglers' Blues
summary: Archer travels to Columbia on a secret mission that becomes not so secret after he gets drunk.

name: The Rules of Extraction
summary: Archer, Ray, and Cyril raft down a crocodile-filled river while Lana and Pam plan a spa day for Malory.

name: On the Carpet
summary: Archer avoids crash landing in a dangerous swamp only to come face-to-face with a shady arms dealer.

name: Archer Vice: Palace Intrigue: Part I
summary: Archer and the rest of the ISIS gang are the guests of Gustavo Calderon and his wife Juliana. Calderon is a big fan of Cherlene but Juliana is a bigger fan of Archer.

name: Archer Vice: Palace Intrigue: Part II
summary: Archer tries to keep his fling with the dictator's wife a secret while Krieger bonds with his clone-brothers.

name: Filibuster
summary: Cyril becomes the new president of San Marcos, Cherlene becomes the first lady of country music, and Archer becomes a resistance fighter.

name: Arrival/Departure
summary: Archer helps Lana with the delivery of her baby, while Krieger tries to prevent the delivery of a deadly weapon.

name: The Holdout
summary: Archer must salvage a crashed plane in a jungle filled with relics from World War II.

name: Three to Tango
summary: An agent from the past has a hand in creating tension between Archer and Lana.

name: The Archer Sanction
summary: Archer, Lana, and Ray climb their way to the top of an assassin's hit list.

name: Edie's Wedding
summary: Pam takes Archer to her sister's wedding but gets side-tracked with technical difficulties.

name: Vision Quest
summary: The gang gets to work early so they can spend some quality time together.

name: Sitting
summary: Archer's first weekend alone with baby AJ is soiled by a Pakistani intelligence officer.

name: Nellis
summary: A rescue mission turns into an out-of-this-world visit to Area 51.

name: The Kanes
summary: Lana introduces Archer to her parents. Archer introduces Lana's parents to high-speed chases.

name: Pocket Listing
summary: Slater has the gang swindle the Durhani royal family and Gillette lends a hand.

name: Reignition Sequence
summary: An office romance is interrupted by the Russians.

name: Achub Y Morfilod
summary: Archer and Lana travel to Wales for a romantic getaway of aiding separatists.

name: Drastic Voyage: Part I
summary: Archer and the gang prepare for their most fantastic voyage ever.

name: Drastic Voyage: Part II
summary: The fantastic voyage concludes.

name: The Figgis Agency
summary: Archer breaks into a mansion to restore the honor of a Hollywood starlet.

name: The Handoff
summary: Archer and Lana make a tricky handoff while the rest of the gang hears the best voicemail ever.

name: Deadly Prep
summary: A prep school reunion leads to an interesting business opportunity for Archer.

name: Motherless Child
summary: A mysterious stranger needs Archer's help in finding his birth mother. He holds Mallory and the rest of the former ISIS crew hostage in order to force them to help him in his search.

name: Bel Panto: Part I
summary: Party crashers turn a fundraiser into no laughing matter.

name: Bel Panto: Part II
summary: A hostage negotiation spirals out of control when Archer and Lana go missing.

name: Double Indecency
summary: Who's sexier, Cyril or Krieger? Pam or Cheryl? Only one way to find out.. Bar fight! Written by Adam Reed.

name: Liquid Lunch
summary: The on-again, off-again relationship of Archer and Slater causes a rift in the on-again, off-again relationship of Archer and Lana.

name: Deadly Velvet: Part I
summary: Archer and the gang are hired by renowned director, Ellis Crane, to investigate suspicious activity on the set of his new movie, Deadly Velvet.

name: Deadly Velvet: Part II
summary: Things get even deadlier on the set of Deadly Velvet when someone turns up, you guessed it, dead.

name: No Good Deed
summary: Archer tries to find out who killed his partner, but accidentally gets in bed with Mother, a notorious L.A. crime boss.

name: Berenice
summary: A mysterious woman hires Archer to fake her death, but he's unable to rise to the occasion.

name: Jane Doe
summary: Archer tries to escape from jail with the help of a crazed heiress and a dysfunctional jazz quartet.

name: Ladyfingers
summary: While investigating a kidnapping, Archer reveals too much about Figgis and Krieger reveals too much about his past.

name: Sleepers Wake
summary: Dutch becomes a new man while Archer's ransom exchange goes up in smoke.

name: Waxing Gibbous
summary: All roads lead to Len Trexler as Archer and the gang try to avoid unfriendly ghosts.

name: Gramercy, Halberd!
summary: Archer and Trexler try to escape a rampaging Dutch by telling the world's worst knock-knock joke.

name: Auflösung
summary: Archer visits Dreamland and receives a big break that leads him to Woodhouse's killer.

name: Strange Pilot
summary: Archer inserts himself into a domestic dispute and engine troubles threaten to ruin his business.

name: Disheartening Situation
summary: Archer estimates his impact on the world while Pam samples the local nightlife.

name: Different Modes of Preparing Fruit
summary: Archer, Pam, and Crackers try to find the missing key to their latest get-rich-quick scheme..

name: A Warrior in Costume
summary: Archer keeps an eye out for a past nemesis.

name: Strange Doings in the Taboo Groves
summary: But there is no joy in Mudville- mighty Pam has struck out.

name: Some Remarks on Cannibalism
summary: Archer and Pam request help from a newcomer but he refuses to lend them a hand.

name: Comparative Wickedness of Civilized and Unenlightened Peoples
summary: Archer helps defend a village from party crashers intent on ruining oysterfest.

name: A Discovery
summary: Archer and the gang enter a deadly temple in search of an even deadlier treasure.

name: Bort the Garj
summary: Archer and the crew of the Seamus wake up to the smell of shepherd's pie and see a business opportunity in their new guest.

name: Happy Borthday
summary: The crew provides entertainment for Bort while Barry-6 tries to crack Archer's safe. Written by Adam Reed.

name: The Leftovers
summary: Pam's sandwich ruins everyone's dinner by releasing something deep inside of them.

name: Dining with the Zarglorp
summary: Deep in space, Archer and the crew encounter a terrifying cosmic beast. Even deeper, they encounter a self-aggrandizing life coach.

name: Mr. Deadly Goes to Town
summary: Archer and the crew pick up a hitchhiker and try to convince him to turn his life around.

name: Road Trip
summary: Daydreams of an interstellar road trip turn into an existential nightmare.

name: Space Pirates
summary: A voyage home gets interrupted by an alien battle cruiser carrying precious cargo.

name: Cubert
summary: Archer is convinced a mysterious object is causing the crew to act strangely. Is it magnetic? Is it supernatural? Does it need to be cleaned with some sterile wipes?

name: Robert De Niro
summary: When a trial turns into a party it can only mean that Barry-6 has returned!.
